name: Racquetball Madness
description:
Racquetball is a sport ball game that takes place on a rectangular indoor court, which means that 2 people play the game at once.

In our Racquetball game you can play with a virtual opponent or online with your friends! Bet and win. Upgrade your character: buy clothes, new moves and taunts! Test your strength and become the winner of the Racquetball Championship!

Rules:
Each side hits the ball in its turn. The ball must be hit before the second touch of the floor surface and can touch all the walls. The ball must be served or hit so that the opponent could not keep him in the game.

The first who reaches 11 points is a true winner. Only the server can win a point. If the one who takes the ball wins the rally, he becomes a server.

Go forward, champion!
